response.original_title: Retrato de un artista siempre adolescente (una historia de cine en Cuba)
response.overview: Starting from the life of the filmmaker Julio Garc√≠a Espinosa, the documentary is projected towards a reflection on the emergence and development of Cuban revolutionary cinematography, its struggles, contradictions and confrontations with dogmatic thinking that at times seems to dominate the Cuban political-cultural spectrum, the always difficult, risky and necessary relationship between officials and artists, and the close and united defense of filmmakers around their film policy.
response.title: Portrait of an Artist Forever Adolescent
